description: There's nothing more comforting than a golden topped cheesy cauliflower bake. This is sure to become a family favourite.
name: Cauliflower Cheese Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cauliflower head, leaves intact, cut into large chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water for for 14 minutes, adding cauliflower and leaves in the last 4 minutes of cooking. Drain. Return to pan.

Meanwhile, melt butter in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until softened. Add bacon and cook for a further 5 minutes, stirring, or until golden.

Reduce heat to low. Add flour and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until a bubbling paste forms. Gradually add milk for 5 minutes, stirring constantly, or until thickened slightly. Add half of the mozzarella and stir for 1 minute or until melted.

Add milk mixture to pasta mixture, then stir to combine. Transfer mixture to a 22 x 32cm roasting pan. Scatter over remaining mozzarella, arrange sage on top, then bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve.
